content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 large eggplant, peeled and sliced" )

content.text: 0) Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "oil"@8:11 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large skillet"@15:30 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium-high heat"@36:52 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Dip eggplant slices in egg, then in crumbs, and place in hot oil.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Dip"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "eggplant slices"@7:22 / FOOD )
		:gol ( ing-2 "egg"@26:29 / FOOD )
		:gol ( ing-3 "crumbs"@39:45 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "place"@51:56 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:gol ( "hot oil"@60:67 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Fry 2 to 3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Fry"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "2 to 3 minutes"@7:21 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until golden brown"@39:57 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:todo ( "each side"@25:34 / OTHER )
	)
)
